meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7004.

td.p: Jennifer Giles, a third grade teacher from Longmont, Colorado
Cathy Farrell, a high school science teacher from Wyandotte, Michigan
Adam Elkana-Hale, a middle school math teacher from St. Louis, Missouri

tr.td: SHE-ROES
(Alex: ...not "heroes".)
A TEXTBOOK CATEGORY
SHAKE IT UP!
WEDDINGS OF THE STARS
"OY" TO THE WORLD
REMEMBER MAINE!

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Time\'s up. Oh, Adam\'s upset with himself because he wrote something down and then, I believe, tried to change it. What did you write down? Let\'s take a look. You were going for, it looks like, the Jordan River and were crossing that out to something that began with "G-R"?)
(Adam: "G-A".)
AdamWhat is the Jorda Gr
$10,000
JenniferWhat is the Danube? Ganges
$9,000
CathyWhat is the Ganges?
$5,000
the Ganges')
